release_note: Thanks everyone for using Whiteboard. Here s what s new in this version: Please keep the feedback coming y all! Enjoy. Improvements FIXED: Messages app drawing was not working. NEW: What s new view shows a summary of what s new on app launch after installing updates UPDATED: Shake to erase is now defaulted to off Jim Issues questions or suggestions Like Whiteboard Please leave a tip in the Tip Jar Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it Please share Whiteboard with a friend or family member to help get the word out. Please send me an email and let me know how you re using Whiteboard send me drawings questions concerns and feedback. Please send me your Whiteboard drawings on Instagram getwhiteboard.

Thanks for using Whiteboard and for all the great feedback and reviews! In this version I worked on some exciting shiny new things : Please keep the feedback coming y all! Enjoy. Introducing the new Whiteboard web version https: getwhiteboard.com it s still very basic but that s kind of the point! Thanks for using Whiteboard and for all the great feedback and reviews! Huge update! In this release I added several highly requested features. Special thanks to Rachel and Avalon for requesting the Rainbow color! Please keep the feedback coming y all! Enjoy. Added: Undo Redo 2 new colors!!! Rainbow and Tan. Enjoy! Remembers your last used marker color and size and canvas color Updated Check out that new app icon it s been freshened up a bit. Let me know what you think! Fixed Improved landscape orientation support Improvement to draw with knobs position indicator Jim Issues questions or suggestions Like Whiteboard Please leave a tip in the Tip Jar Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it Please share Whiteboard with a friend or family member to help get the word out.

Thanks for using Whiteboard and for all the great feedback and reviews! I worked on several user feedback requests and bug fixes. lots of under the hood improvements too. Please keep the feedback coming y all! Enjoy. Added: Tip Jar If you or someone you know enjoys using Whiteboard please leave a generous tip. A new section in settings called Whiteboard Labs where you can opt in to try early versions of upcoming features Infinite Canvas feature has been added in Whiteboard Labs allowing you to add more pages to your canvas. Updated The Clear button has been moved out of the action menu as a standalone button in the lower left corner. Fixed some stylus users were seeing inconsistent line width compared to finger drawing Jim Issues questions or suggestions Like Whiteboard Please leave a Generous Tip in the Tip Jar Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it Share Whiteboard with a friend or family member to help get the word out.

Thanks for using Whiteboard and for all the great feedback and reviews! In this version I focused on adding some fun new features! Special thanks to Chloè for for sending some great suggestions. Please keep the feedback coming y all! Enjoy. Added: Additional pen sizes Rearranged the color palette. My daughter was very insistent the colors needed to be rearranged in the order she liked. Scratch your own itch eh! A fun new feature for drawing the old school way knobs forever! More preference toggles in settings. Jim Issues questions or suggestions Like Whiteboard Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it

Thanks for using Whiteboard and for all the great feedback and reviews! In this version I focused on adding some highly requested from my 3 year old daughter new features! Here s what s new in this version: Added: Draw together in Messages draw pictures together with family and friends. Just send a drawing to a friend using the Messages app and they can open it and draw on it too and then send it back. My daughter requested Pink for dresses and Brown for trees so I added Pink and Brown. I also added Teal and Gray because my wife really wanted those colors. Moved photos print share actions to a separate menu Jim Issues questions or suggestions Like Whiteboard Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it

Thanks for using Whiteboard and for all the great feedback and reviews! In this version I focused on iOS 13 dark mode improvements and responding to feedback from my 3 year old daughter about saving her drawings. Here s what s new in this version: Added: Added a secondary menu that s only visible when you can take actions on the drawing Added an action for saving your drawings to your photos library Added an action for printing your drawings Added an action for sharing your drawings with other apps Added a button for saving your drawing to your Photos library Added the color White to the color menu Fixed: White and Black colors are now independent of dark mode so you can use both in both dark and light modes default color in dark mode is white default color in light mode is black Issues questions or suggestions Like Whiteboard Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it
